fullplot: Because of their children's bad grades, some parents want the teacher Mrs. Mèller gone. They meet with Mrs. Mèller and try to convince her to leave the class.
plot: Because of their children's bad grades, some parents want the teacher Mrs. Mèller gone. They meet with Mrs. Mèller and try to convince her to leave the class.
title: Frau Mèller muss weg!
